price: 12. Alobi: Nkolo, ya sólo nazali kobanga ete bandimela ngai te.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī akhāfu an yukadhibūni
